details.sectionContent: 'Internet of Things' based sensor controlling and monitoring

In this workshop we will demonstrate how you can INTERFACE , CONTROL , AND MONITOR, electronic equipment devices and sensor around you using IoT. You will also learn how Google assistant or Amazon Alexa works and use them as mediator to control devices through IoT.

o Hands-on Understanding of different components like 1. NodeMCU (open source platform) 2. Led interfacing 3. Diffrent sensors o Basic understanding of circuit and its connections and how the circuit works. o Also Basics of interfacing and access GPIO of controller using LED and IR. (Including connections and diagram
Complete interfacing of all sensors and also controlling them using smartphone and laptop. o Understanding and demo of Amazon Alexa used with NodeMCU to control electronic devices.
